channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-29264] Use metaconf prefix to honor metastore configurations for direct sql in q-files
item.description:
In alter_table_column_stats.q, the hive.metastore.try.direct.sql=false for partitioned table and following command is running:

analyze table testpart0 compute statistics for columns;

but the JDO implementation for get_aggr_stats_for is to throw MetaException but the exception is not thrown. As soon I replace it with set metaconf:metastore.try.direct.sql=false then exception is observed in 

itests/qtest/target/surefire-reports/org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestMiniLlapLocalCliDriver-output.txt

but q file is not failing.

In short,

  1. replace hivename with varname for metaconfs
  2. investigate whether error be thrown if JDO fails.

Attaching TestMiniLlapLocalCliDriver-output.txt showing 

metastore.RetryingHMSHandler: MetaException(message:Jdo path is not implemented for stats aggr.)

 

Stacktrace:

2025-10-10T00:04:54,397 ERROR [dc1b1868-d07a-4dcc-9cbd-6a0b7eca7e46 main] metastore.RetryingHMSHandler: MetaException(message:Jdo path is not implemented for stats aggr.)	at item.summary: Use metaconf prefix to honor metastore configurations for direct sql in q-files

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
To repro:

Run the attached alter_table_column_stats.q with (modified line 137 with metaconf prefix) 

mvn clean test -Dtest=TestMiniLlapLocalCliDriver -Dqfile=alter_table_column_stats.q -Drat.skip -Pitests -pl itests/qtest

and check the output of itests/qtest/target/surefire-reports/org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestMiniLlapLocalCliDriver-output.txt

Merged. Aggarwal_Raghav Thanks for your contribution!

https://github.com/apache/hive/pull/6129
